attributes.action: scrap the generous pensions handed out to members of parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs get a very generous pension when they retire unlike the majority of the population.  This is especially disingenuous when the government is trying to prevent any of us funding our retirement in any other way - for example, by clamping down on income from property rentals.  If the vast majority of people will end up with little pension, why should MPs be any different?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
